amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 112 which pertains to the definition of fill material or discharge of fill material for the purposes of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to strike section 112 which pertains to the definition of fill material or discharge of fill material for the purposes of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 226 (Roll no. 312).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 226 (Roll no. 312).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Moran.
